Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

This tool allows a Link to be added to a Diagram model. The Link must be anchored in a (non-Link) Figure and its sink will be at the current mouse position until it can be placed into another (non-Link) Figure
